'''Abundant Phlogiston''' is an [[Event Card]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

==Story==
{{Description|A special high-temperature thermal energy that can be found throughout Natlan. It comes in all shapes and sizes, and has many wondrous uses...<br>After Nightsoul points are fully depleted, warriors will switch to consuming Phlogiston to maintain their Nightsoul's Blessing.|title=Abundant Phlogiston}}
